casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher MOSBY. No. 354P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Christopher Mosby, Brunswick, for Mosby, Christopher. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of October 2015 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
